channel.title: Ideacode on Agile technology solutions that work for you, the spaces you manage, and the people who use them. | ideacode Software
channel.description: Recent content in Ideacode on Agile technology solutions that work for you, the spaces you manage, and the people who use them. | ideacode Software

item.title: Lightweight Website Initiative
item.description: Lightweight Website Initiative Count every bit or every bit counts What is a lightweight website? A lightweight website strives to be efficient and slim. It uses the minimal necessary html, css, js, in order to render and deliver content. Why does it matter? Every bit has multiple costs. There is the initial cost of the server to process the request and generate the response. The response is then transmitted through the internet to the client’s browser.

item.title: Roundcube
item.description: Access to email on the web has moved to a new location. Please visit our new email location at https://mail.ideacode.com, and make sure to update your bookmarks. If you stored your password in your browser, your browser may not know how to provide your password on the new location. If you need help with your password, please call your ideacode support representative.

item.title: ideacode will present at the 2012 CFTA conference
item.description:
ideacode will present at the 2012 CFTA conference:

  • Lifting the Space Planning Blues:
    How NC State University completed a massive space analysis by switching from hand-colored plans to automated coloring
    (Tuesday August 7, 2012 – 9:45-10:45 am / Computer-Aided Facilities Management)

  • Building a Better GIS
    Harnessing the opportunity of GIS on mobile devices and tablet computers, while serving the needs of big desktop.
    (Tuesday August 7, 2012 – 1:15-2:15 pm / GIS)

Hope to see you there! Check us out at booth #12.
